No heat means no damage, so your hair stays healthy, shiny, and full of body. Whether you’re creating an overnight blowout or prepping for a special event, these flexi rods double as rollers hair curlers you can comfortably sleep in, ensuring salon-quality results every time. Perfect for travel or at-home styling, the Rachel Roy Rubber Hair Rollers give you beautiful, voluminous curls – without the heat, hassle, or harm.
